title: Baked salmon with lemony orzo, peas and bacon
ingredients: ['200g orzo', '2 teaspoons garlic powder', '5 large basil leaves, thinly sliced, divided', '2 teaspoons sea salt, divided', '675g skin-on, salmon fillet', '55g butter, melted, divided', '3 slices bacon, chopped', '450g frozen peas', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '2 lemons, juiced, divided']
